org.cougaar.core.component
Interface ServiceView

public interface ServiceView

A ViewService view of an advertised or obtained service.

Method Summary
 int getId()
          Get the unique identifier of this service.
 java.util.Map getIndirectlyAdvertisedServices()
          If this service class contains a "get.
 ComponentDescription getProviderComponentDescription()
          Get the service provider's ComponentDescription, or null if it is not known or this is an advertised service (in which case the provider is the component being viewed).
 int getProviderId()
          Get the service provider's identifier, or 0 if it is not known or this is an advertised service (in which case the provider is the component being viewed).
 long getTimestamp()
          Get the time in milliseconds when the service was obtained/advertised, or zero if the service has since been released/revoked.
 

Method Detail

getId

int getId()
Get the unique identifier of this service.

getTimestamp

long getTimestamp()
Get the time in milliseconds when the service was obtained/advertised, or zero if the service has since been released/revoked.

getProviderId

int getProviderId()
Get the service provider's identifier, or 0 if it is not known or this is an advertised service (in which case the provider is the component being viewed).

getProviderComponentDescription

ComponentDescription getProviderComponentDescription()
Get the service provider's ComponentDescription, or null if it is not known or this is an advertised service (in which case the provider is the component being viewed).

getIndirectlyAdvertisedServices

java.util.Map getIndirectlyAdvertisedServices()
If this service class contains a "get.*ServiceBroker()" method, get a map of "Class --> ServiceView"s for all services indirectly advertised through the "get.*ServiceBroker()"'s ServiceBroker.addService(java.lang.Class, org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceProvider) method.

This is primarily used to track services advertised by the core's org.cougaar.core.node.NodeControlService, which provides access to the root-level ServiceBroker.
